title: Vegetarian chilli in your slow cooker
ingredients: ['120ml olive oil', '4 onions, chopped', '2 green peppers, seeded and chopped', '2 red peppers, seeded and chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '450g firm tofu, drained and cubed', '4 (400g) tins black beans, drained', '800ml tomato passata or sieved tomatoes', '2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '6 tablespoons chilli powder', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '2 tablespoons distilled white vinegar', '1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce, such as TabascoÂ®']
